encyclopedia.content: 词典解释 intoxication英音：[in,tɔksi'keiʃən]美音：[ɪn,tɑksə'keʃən] 名词 n. [U]1.醉 2.陶醉；极度兴奋；狂喜 3.【医】中毒歌曲 东方神起成员俊秀在日本以XIAH JUNSU为名SOLO出道发行的单曲《XIAH Intoxication》 单曲中收录主打歌《Intoxication》、《悲しみのゆくえ》，以及东方神起成员有天主演的电视剧《Beautiful Love～如果有你在～》的主题曲《君がい

entry.def: Intoxication is the state of being drunk.

entry.def: You use intoxication to refer to a quality that something has that makes you feel very excited.

means.word_mean: 1. the physiological state produced by a poison or other toxic substance
2. a temporary state resulting from excessive consumption of alcohol
3. excitement and elation beyond the bounds of sobriety;
